Package org.eclipse.mosaic.app.examples.commuter

Class SimpleCommuterApp

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.app.AbstractApplication<VehicleOperatingSystem>
org.eclipse.mosaic.app.examples.commuter.SimpleCommuterApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Application, OperatingSystemAccess<VehicleOperatingSystem>, VehicleApplication, EventProcessor
public class SimpleCommuterApp extends AbstractApplication<VehicleOperatingSystem> implements VehicleApplication
This application simulates the behaviour of a commuting vehicle. The vehicle will spend a specified amount of time at the goal position.

      Initializes an instance of the SimpleCommuterApp.
      Parameters:
      activityDurationInHours - the time the vehicle spends at the goal position before driving back to the start position
